defend.name: Defense
defend.description: Fragged an opponent who was either close to base or close to the flag carrier.

assist.name: Assist
assist.description: Returned the flag, allowing a teammate to score.

impressive.name: Impressive
impressive.description: Hit two rails in a row.

excellent.name: Excellent
excellent.description: Fragged two opponents within a short period of time.

frags.name: Frags
frags.description: Fragged three opponents with a short period of time.

accuracy.name: Accuracy
accuracy.description: Hit an opponent multiple times with the same weapon and perfect accuracy.

telefrag.name: Telefrag
telefrag.description: Teleported into another player's personal space.

telemissile_frag.name: Interdimensional
telemissile_frag.description: Fragged an opponent by firing through a teleporter.

bullseye.name: Bulseye
bullseye.description: Directly hit an opponent far away with a rocket.

airrocket.name: Air-Rocket
airrocket.description: Hit an opponent with a rocket while they were in the air.

airgrenade.name: Air-Nade
airgrenade.description: Hit an opponent with a grenade while they were in the air.

rocketrail.name: Combo Kill (Rocket -> Rail)
rocketrail.description: Made an opponent fly into the air with a rocket, then fragged them with a rail slug.

lgrail.name: Combo Kill (Lightning -> Rail)
lgrail.description: Fragged an opponent by dealing lightning damage first and then finishing them off with a rail slug.

railtwo.name: Rail Master
railtwo.description: Shot through two opponents with a single rail slug.

deadhand.name: Dead Hand
deadhand.description: Fragged an opponent with a projectile fired prior to dying.

showstopper.name: Show Stopper
showstopper.description: Fragged someone who had a powerup.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: Fragged an opponent who just spawned or came through a portal.

kamikaze.name: Kamikaze
kamikaze.description: Fragged an opponent while taking his own life.

strongman.name: Strongman
strongman.description: Fraged all of the enemy team on your own.

hero.name: Hero
hero.description: Got the flag out of the enemy based, returned their own flag and then caputred, all alone.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: Fragged the opponent who fragged them quickly after respawn.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.description: Got 3 gaunt frags in a row without dying.

vaporized.name: Vaporized
vaporized.description: Fragged an opponent by doing more than 100 plasma damage within 800ms.

twitchrail.name: Aimbot
twitchrail.description: Turned very quickly and hit an opponent with railgun.
